feed.title: Montreal River Harbour - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Montreal River Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:02 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 01:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
Temperature: -7.8°C
Pressure: 100.2 kPa
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -9.2°C
Wind: NNE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 late in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Clearing. High minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
